participants: 118 adults with OA or RA and chronic insomnia (ISI ≥15)
notes: Cannabidiol for Arthritis-Related Insomnia: A Randomized Controlled Trial
abstract: CBD: ISI reduced 58% (19.2 → 8.1); Placebo: ISI reduced 22% (18.8 → 14.7); p<0.001; polysomnography: total sleep time increased 54 minutes, sleep efficiency improved 18%
